title: The Star Guardians
body: The Star Guardian skin set looks amazing, Totally trendy, I think this skin set deserves to be made, Please Riot.  Even if there were maybe different champions.

replies.body: Yesssssssssss! More Star Guardians!!! @u@
Tuxedo Mask needs to be somewhere in there
Tuxedo taric on his way

The heck are you smoking!

It's gotta be {{champion:4}} , no one else could dream of pulling it off.
but he needs a new name What about Fab Mask or Fabulous Mask lol
Ez or TF with rose particles
I know right! They would be so sweet.
The Look is already there too.

then riot makes galatic  skins for boys :D {{champion:201}} {{champion:122}} ? passsive shows planets{{champion:41}} oranges = planets. eat planets and k{{champion:79}} SUPER NOVA{{champion:126}} pew pew{{champion:57}} {{champion:2}} THROWS LASERS/ shoots{{champion:421}} spaceship?
idk
TF should be tuxedo mask.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Galetta,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=oVu1jFuI,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-06-29T17:59:32.712+0000)
>
> Yesssssssssss! More Star Guardians!!! @u@

{{champion:103}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:134}} 
There's the last 4.  Rito please, I _need_ this...and Revive to come back. The last part isn't necessary for this topic but...yeah, it would be appreciated.

Riven is already in the picture from the OP.

I nominate {{champion:10}}, or possibly {{champion:43}}.
You make that fiora skin and ill buy it in a heart beat
:o I love the Fiora!

Fiora is good for that, but please.

Star Guardian Diana and Star Guardian Leona.

You know you want them ;D
B-but, the moon isn't a star?
*pats* Shh...shh...it'll be good. You'll love it.
Fighting evil by moonlight!
Sailor MOON?
technically it isn't a planet either ( and now neither is pluto) but that didnt stop Sailor Moon last i checked.
she could be that cat. There was a cat right?
Luna? Give Gnar the Luna skin and Teemo a Kyubey Skin
why not give {{champion:76}} that skin?
Luna DOES have a Humanoid form, doesn't she? I Guess Nid WOULD work better
or even this Syndra idea! I love Syndra
I have a need.
Star guardian... The sun is a star, Leona needs one as well!
NO, EZREAL IS THE GREEN ONE
Let the girls have this one.
Lol, I feel the girls should be the ones rocking this.

It's a nice concept, but the outfits need to be more diverse...
Realistically speaking, for example, how would you expect Riven, Irelia, and Fiora to fight in really short skirts and show off that much skin?

Have you ever seen anime?

That's, like, every magical girl anime ever.
Even gender-bent magical girl anime(aka magical boy anime).

*Especially* gender-bent and/or cross-dressing magical boy anime!

I nominate Kore Wa Zombie Desu Ka.
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/shokugekinosoma/images/0/02/Cabbage_Pink.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150613051813
Please tell me what that's from.

Shokugeki no Soma. 

Which is technically a cooking show, though it really doesn't like staying within the genre's established boundaries.

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CE526MEWAAARLg1.jpg:large

Even better

Too many top laners I think :( 

I like the idea of Riven, but I also think Janna and Diana would be really good for a star guardian set~!
Not sure about all the choices of champs, but would definetely support more star guardians.
Replace Riven Or Irelia For Diana so you have a jg.
Id be intrested in a star guardian {{champion:1}}  I wonder what tibbers would be like
Wasn't there a joke way back when where someone at Riot wanted a Magical Girl Cho'Gath skin?

Too many top laners. And their outfits are cloned. Everyone's hair is the same as their base skin's except for Lux, who we are basing the skin idea off of, silly. Change their hair up~!

TOP - Star Guardian Riven {{champion:92}}. She can have a normal schoolgirl outfit and when her ultimate is on she turns into the Sailor Moon-esque being of awesomeness. 10/10. Her hair would be in the updo it usually is, and when she ults it could be like, Redeemed Riven hair.

JUNGLE - Star Guardian Shyvana {{champion:102}}. Do you like dragons? 

MID - Star Guardian Zyra {{champion:143}} has got to be one of my favorites. Please... I just really want Kyoko Sakura Zyra tho. As for her outfit and hair...
https://33.media.tumblr.com/356194e24116a8dd6c15edcde3d0f170/tumblr_mx9fw7fT7h1rmi4uyo1_500.gif

ADC - Star Guardian Jinx {{champion:222}}. I'm a little biased 'cuz she's my favorite ADC but IMAGINE. She could be Mami Tomoe because... Guns.
http://24.media.tumblr.com/135357ab0c4d347848d9d2a05affa8d0/tumblr_mrocoq7Fz91scsnv1o2_r3_400.gif

SUPPORT - Star Guardian Sona {{champion:37}}  or Star Guardian Leona {{champion:89}}. 'Cause Sona is like Hatsune Miku, the anime love of most weeb's lives. And Leona is a sun. Which is a star.
Graggy would look awesome as a star guardian
What about Garen?  He's Lux's sister.  Certainly he deserves a Star Guardian skin.  Especially since we haven't seen a new Gare-Bear skin in awhile.  <3
why isn't soraka (the star child) as a star gardian ??
I disprove. Mundo needs to be a member of this team.
I'd prefer {{champion:22}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:16}} to round out the Star Guardians, but these look really good. We definitely need more Star Guardian skins.
